tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clinical_trials (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_name VARCHAR(255),
    sponsor_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    patient_count INT,
    ethical_approval BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE clinical_trials (
    trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    lead_researcher VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE trial_participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_id UUID REFERENCES clinical_trials(trial_id),
    participant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    enrollment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication VARCHAR(50),
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(100),
  trial_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE trial_patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  patient_age INT,
  site_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES trial_sites (site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trial_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (trial_id) REFERENCES clinical_trials (trial_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES trial_patients (patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(255),
  organization VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE subjects (
  subject_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  subject_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  trial_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (trial_id) REFERENCES trials(trial_id)
);

CREATE TABLE subject_trials (
  subject_id INT,
  trial_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (subject_id, trial_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (subject_id) REFERENCES subjects(subject_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trial_id) REFERENCES trials(trial_id)
);

CREATE TABLE measurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  subject_id INT,
  trial_id INT,
  measurement_date DATE,
  value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (subject_id, trial_id) REFERENCES subject_trials(subject_id, trial_id)
);
